newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trade in Heng Fung shares suspended.
newsitem.headline: Trade in Heng Fung shares suspended.

text.p: Trading in shares of property concern Heng Fung Holdings Co Ltd was suspended at the company's request pending an announcement, the Hong Kong stock exchange said on Thursday.
Heng Fung shares ended HK$0.04 higher at HK$0.78 on Wednesday.
Last month, Heng Fung proposed to distribute a bonus issue of 131.92 million warrants to shareholders in the proportion of one warrant for every five shares.
Each warrant carries the rights to subscribe one new company share at HK$0.48, exercisable from May 26, 1997, to May 30, 1998.
